pages.text: $(li)The Ignitium Ingot is a warm and even harder material than the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/end_crystal_ingot)End Crystal Ingot$(/l).$(br)$(li)It seems that it can be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:bosses/ignis)Ignis$(/l) on death.$(br)$(li)This material can be used to forge the $(l:patchouli:armors/ignitium_armor)Ignitium Armor$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:utility/cataclysm/ignitium_block)Ignitium Block$(/l).
